name: This Game is Self-Aware
description:
What happens when you grant your characters self-awareness? As it turns out, a lot of fun, meta references and shenanigans! (and maybe a sprinkle of romance?)

Mess around with our disgruntled 'hero' in this irreverent and cheeky take on pop-culture, chock-full of references and fourth-wall demolition.

Try to navigate through every possibility and grab all achievements!

This game was made from scratch in a single week for the wonderful O2A2 Jam.

Written and Developed by me (lukaskrew.itch.io)

Sprite by runeraccoon (runeraccoon.itch.io)

Music ("War is Over") by Ramol
